speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: plants rustling in the distance, and the wind rushing above you!

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: a low guttural growl, muffled as if behind a wall of trees.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: branches snapping suddenly, like something heavy moving through the forest.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: distant whispering voices overlapping, unintelligible but urgent.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: wings flapping violently, then vanishing into silence.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: a single, sharp knock on wood, echoing unnaturally long.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: a familiar voice crying out desperately, "Please—look at me! I need your help!" The tone cracks between panic and pleading, echoing unnaturally as if carried by the wind.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: deep, distorted breathing right at the back of your neck.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: crackling leaves circling you as if stirred by invisible footsteps.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: a child’s laughter, far away, bending into static.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: a low-frequency rumble beneath the ground, shaking faintly.

speaker: mon_birdbox
sound: metallic scraping sound, like claws dragging across stone.

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice say "Look here! Help me!".

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice yell "TAKE THAT FUCKING BLINDFOLD OFF NOW!".

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice whisper, "You’re safe if you just look… it’s beautiful here."

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice shout angrily, "STOP HIDING BEHIND THAT CLOTH! FACE THE TRUTH!"

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice laugh hysterically, then yell, "We can all see it—why can’t you?"

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice hiss, "Take it off… take it off… take it off…" repeating faster each time.

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice call gently, "It’s okay, you’re safe now. Just look."

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice scream in rage, "BLIND FOOLS! OPEN YOUR EYES!"

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice chant rhythmically, "See… see… see…" like a ritual echo.

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice whisper mockingly, "Do you think that cloth will save you forever?"

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice giggle softly, then murmur, "Take the blindfold off, and it’ll stop hurting."

speaker: mon_feral_cultist
sound: an unfamiliar voice roar furiously, "LOOK AT IT! LOOK AT IT NOW!"
